 =C2=A0   Hi,
Actually, the signature reads Tango no Kami Kane=
michi. This is the second generation. I am sorry to hear that the blade has=
 been badly damaged as the signature is very close to being genuine.
Gordon=

m.ar [nihontostudy] <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>:

 =C2=A0   Dear T
Thank=
 you very much!Unfortunately the blade is very, very damaged=C2=A0Not worth=
 even trying a polished, has the mark of generations of children have playe=
d with that sword...There came to my hands with the tsuba, one seppa, a hab=
aki and the blade destroyed.Any other information that you could add?=C2=A0=
Then I will upload photos of what remains of that bladeThanks and regards f=
rom Argentina 

     El Mi=C3=A9rcoles, 22 de octubre, 2014 18:57:38, "junk=
mail@... [nihontostudy]" <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com> escribi=
=C3=B3:
   

  =C2=A0  Eduardo -=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0The inscription rea=
ds "Tamba no Kami Yoshimichi" and it looks to be a well cut mei. Not to say=
 that it=C2=A0is genuine, we really would have to see some photos of the bl=
ade but first impression looks pretty good.-t=C2=A0=C2=A0
